## StateListener interface

Represents a listener for a specific value of type T in the state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default interface StateListener<T> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [callback(currentValue)](./answers-headless.statelistener.callback.md) | The function to call when the state value updates. |
|  [valueAccessor(state)](./answers-headless.statelistener.valueaccessor.md) | Accesses a value of type T in the state. |
